messages.message: Invalid colorModel in basic DFD block for RGB VkFormat.
messages.details: DFD block #1 colorModel in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_MODEL_YUVSDA but for VkFormat VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM it must be KHR_DF_MODEL_RGBSDA.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
